attributes.review: The app gave me hives. Also instructions unclear. Now my cat thinks he’s a stripper. I think this app needs to be removed immediately, as I think it has caused enough trauma for many people including my grandma. She had a stroke when reading his campaign summary. Bad vibes overall.
attributes.title: Bunker boy

attributes.review: This Trump app makes my phone all glitchy and makes it slow. The app also is pretty confusing to where I’m literally about to delete it! I highly suggest not using this app and using just the NEWS app!
attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review:
the racist in the white house does not deserve to be there. it only takes someone who averagely educated and doesn’t watch fox news to know this. let’s recall that the minority is currently ruling. Hillary has 3 million more votes.

attributes.review: I downloaded this app because I thought it was a game but when I downloaded it my phone was glitching so bad and it started to play some horrifying music and then my phone broke into 5000 pieces and I had to get a new one. Do not recommend 😌
attributes.title: Worst App Ever😭

attributes.review: I couldn’t get the software to work properly no matter how hard I tried and it slowed down my phone significantly. The app want even helpful when it did work. Don’t waste your time.
attributes.title: This app will mess up your phone

attributes.review: I downloaded this app  because I found interest in Donald Trump. The app is very miss leading. Trump promised to build walls and help with the economy. He has done neither. This campaign is a waste of time. He doesn’t come through with promises. It’s time for America to do....better.
attributes.title: Disfunctional and Uninformative

attributes.review: i downloaded this looking for reasons why we should vote for him i did not find any reasons why and than i for a text saying ifI deleted the app they would feed my kid to rats i highly doubt the rats could eat a 90 pound two year old and vote EBP445 for president
attributes.title: e

attributes.review: Didn’t even want to open up the app because as soon as I downloaded it, in hopes of opening up my political view mind you, I started to smell this awful thing that almost burned all of my decent working and logical brain cells so no thanks uwu.
attributes.title: 🥰🧚🏻‍♀️✨

attributes.review: I decided to download this app because it seemed like a “TOTALLY” great idea to “support” our “LOVELY” fascist leader and be a “PROUDDDD” ‘mercian citizen🧚😙. But the app kept asking alot of personal and unneeded info about me and it just an app thats not worth getting because he’s just a creamsicle! (Orange on outside, white on inside and a stick up his 🍑)😘🥵🤗
attributes.title: 🌝NO THANKS SIRRR 🧚🌝

attributes.review: This app is terrible!! Bugs everywhere, slower than any app i’ve seen, constantly glitching and completely impossible to navigate!! So disappointed !! I downloaded this in hopes to post my adoration for my cheeto !! His Great Orangeness.
attributes.title: Absolutely Impossible to Use
